level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition, see § 2 of Exploratory Committee Regulation Temporary Amendment Act of 2007 (D.C. Law 17-2, April 18, 2007, law notification 54 DCR 6581).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2 of Exploratory Committee Regulation Emergency Amendment Act of 2007 (D.C. Act 17-13, January 29, 2007, 54 DCR 1520).

For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 401(f) of Board of Ethics and Government Accountability Establishment and Comprehensive Ethics Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-298, January 29, 2012, 59 DCR 683).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-104
level.text: Law 17-104, the "Exploratory Committee Regulation Amendment Act of 2007", was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-36 which was referred to the Committee on Workforce Development and Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 2, 2007, and November 6, 2007, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 28, 2007, it was assigned Act No. 17-223 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-104 became effective on February 2, 2008.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-124
level.text: For history of Law 19-124, see notes under § 1-1101.
